There's something exciting and ethereal about this tune. The celestial tinkling sounds make me think of the cosmos, while the base drop reminds me of the drone of rocket engines, combining in a really interesting and catchy way particularly appropriate for the subject matter. I wonder if this is what Everyday Astronaut had in mind. This is a really well done diddy and a perfect theme for this channel.
